Package org.pepstock.charba.client.defaults.globals

Class AbstractDefaultOptionsElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.defaults.globals.AbstractDefaultOptionsElement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IsDefaultOptionsElement
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultArc, DefaultBar, DefaultLine, DefaultPoint
    abstract class AbstractDefaultOptionsElement
extends Object
implements IsDefaultOptionsElement
    CHART.JS default values for ARC, LINE, BAR and POINT elements.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private String borderColor  
      private int borderWidth  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AbstractDefaultOptionsElement​(int borderWidth)
      Creates the object using the values passed as arguments.
      Background and border colors will be taken from Options.getBackgroundColorAsString() and Options.getBorderColorAsString().
      AbstractDefaultOptionsElement​(String borderColor, int borderWidth)
      Creates the object using the values passed as arguments.
      Background color will be taken from Options.getBackgroundColorAsString().

      Returns the border width.

      Returns the background color when hovered.

      Returns the border color when hovered.

      Returns the border width when hovered.

        Parameters:

        borderWidth - order width of element
